aayojana kalapayata ayath karmantha shalawaka je. si. bi. yanthrayaka rupiyal 80,000k watina rodayak sorakam karana lada thidenek adhikaranaya hamuwata paminawimen anathuruwa, horana mahesthrath mahinda ranasinha mahatha wisin ek ayakuta rupiyal 1500 bagin wu dadada, esema ek ayakuta awurudu 05kata athhitawu masa 03ka siradanduwamak bagin siradanduwam thunakda niyama kaleya.withthikaruwan kalawawa, wijithapura, bulathsinhala saha nawa nagaraya - wirawila pradeshawala padinchikaruwanya.ingiriya polisiye aparadha wimarshana anshaye sthanadhipathi ke. ji. wijerathna mahatha wisin naduwa meheyawiya.balapathra nomathiwa tipar riyakin pas prawahanaya kala pudgalayakuta horana mahesthrath mahinda ranasinha mahatha wisin rupiyal 50,000ka dadayak niyama kaleya.melesa dada niyama wuye munagama, horana pradeshaye padinchikaruwakuta ya.ingiriya polisiye kosthapalwarun wana 424 aruna saha 68172 lakmal yana aya wisin ingiriya nagarayedi mema pas pirawu tipar rathaya athadanguwata gena thibuni.goda drams 5900k saha perime upakarana langa thabagath pudgalayakuta horana mahesthrath mahinda ranasinha mahatha wisin rupiyal 1,20,000ka dadayak niyama kaleya.withthikaru hadupalpola, millawa pradeshaye padinchikaruweki.panadura dushana mardana eekakaye sthanadhipathi upa polis parikshaka nayanajith, sarayan 30787 nelum saha kosthapal 69918 wasantha yana aya wisin sakakaru athadanguwata gena thibuni..
